context.rdfs:comment: Entities that have a somewhat fixed, physical extension.
context.rdfs:label: Place

properties.rdfs:comment: The opening hours of a certain place.
properties.rdfs:label: openingHoursSpecification

properties.rdfs:comment: A URL to a map of the place.
properties.rdfs:label: maps

properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether it is allowed to smoke in the place, e.g. in the restaurant, hotel or hotel room.
properties.rdfs:label: smokingAllowed

properties.rdfs:comment: A URL to a map of the place.
properties.rdfs:label: map

properties.rdfs:comment:
A short textual code (also called "store code") that uniquely identifies a place of business. The code is typically assigned by the parentOrganization and used in structured URLs.

For example, in the URL http://www.starbucks.co.uk/store-locator/etc/detail/3047 the code "3047" is a branchCode for a particular branch.
properties.rdfs:label: branchCode

properties.rdfs:comment: A URL to a map of the place.
properties.rdfs:label: hasMap

properties.rdfs:comment:
The special opening hours of a certain place.

Use this to explicitly override general opening hours brought in scope by openingHoursSpecification or openingHours.
properties.rdfs:label: specialOpeningHoursSpecification

properties.rdfs:comment: The geo coordinates of the place.
properties.rdfs:label: geo

properties.rdfs:comment: The basic containment relation between a place and one that contains it.
properties.rdfs:label: containedInPlace

properties.rdfs:comment: The basic containment relation between a place and one that contains it.
properties.rdfs:label: containedIn

properties.rdfs:comment: The basic containment relation between a place and another that it contains.
properties.rdfs:label: containsPlace

properties.rdfs:comment: A flag to signal that the Place is open to public visitors. If this property is omitted there is no assumed default boolean value
properties.rdfs:label: publicAccess
